title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When trying to add breakpoints or marks in a Java editor using the Photon version, the popup menu does not appear.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

OB: The expected behavior is that a menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc., but it does not.
EB: The popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor.
SR:
SR:1) Open a Java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

SR: The popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
